title: No guts, no glory: Tadej Pogačar says Tour de France is ‘not over’ after big TT time loss
content:
The two-time winner eyes up the final two mountain stages as he still looks to overhaul Jonas Vingegaard's lead in yellow.

Read the full article at No guts, no glory: Tadej Pogačar says Tour de France is ‘not over’ after big TT time loss on Velo.
author: sadhbhoshea
